components.description:
A construction worker wearing a hard-hat (safety helmet). Has a high visibility vest or hammer in some variations.

Some platforms display a green cross on the helmet which is used in Japan as a safety reminder in construction zones. It is also commonly seen on the Met helmet in the game Mega Man.
components.title: Construction Worker

description:
A construction worker wearing a hard-hat (safety helmet). Has a high visibility vest or hammer in some variations.

Some platforms display a green cross on the helmet which is used in Japan as a safety reminder in construction zones. It is also commonly seen on the Met helmet in the game Mega Man.
title: Construction Worker

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A construction worker wearing a hard-hat (safety helmet) for safety. MayÂ be tired after a hard day at work. Some platforms display a cross o http://emojipedia.org/construction-worker/
emoji_net_data.name: construction worker

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00089233v: Put on or wear a hat

bn:00084198v: Make by combining materials and parts
To create something by combining or assembling materials or parts or by changing it.
To form by combining materials or parts.
(transitive) to form by combining materials or parts.
To build or form (something) by assembling parts.
To form or formulate in the mind.

bn:00064681n: A member of the working class (not necessarily employed)

bn:00022076n: Tradesman, labourer, or professional employed in the physical construction of the built environment
A worker skilled in building offices or dwellings etc.
Employee working at a physical construction.
A construction worker is a tradesman, laborer, or professional employed in the physical construction of the built environment and its infrastructure.

bn:00013723n: Or the erection of a building
Building construction is the process of preparing for and forming buildings and building systems.
Process that consists of the building or assembling of infrastructure

The construction, rehabilitation, alteration, conversion, extension, demolition or repair of buildings, highways, or other changes or improvement to real property, including facilities providing utility services.
The act or process of building.

bn:00043623n: A protective helmet, as worn, for example, by a motorcyclist, bicyclist, or soldier in combat.
A helmet is a form of protective gear worn to protect the head from injuries.
Any of various forms of protective head covering worn e.g.  by soldiers, firefighters, divers, cyclists, etc.
Armor plate that protects the head

bn:00052968n: Determined sex of an animal. Use Q6581097 for a male human
A member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
A male organism is the physiological sex which produces sperm.
An animal of the sex that has testes.

bn:00049570n: The social class of those who perform physical work for a living, as opposed to the professional or middle class, the upper class, or others.
The proletariat is a term used to describe the class of wage-earners in a capitalist society whose only possession of significant material value is their labour-power.
Those employed in lower tier jobs
Workers in general; the working class, the workforce; sometimes specifically the labour movement, organised labour.
The working class or lower class.
A social class comprising those who do manual labor or work for wages
One of the factors of production. It includes all the exertions - manual, physical or mental - by individuals, directed towards the production of wealth.
A social class comprising those who do manual labour for wage, especially those who do not own any property.

The proletariat is a term used to describe the class of wage-earners in a capitalist society whose only possession of significant material value is their labour-power ; a member of such a class is a proletarian.
Those employed in blue collar and manual jobs
The working class is the class of people employed for wages, especially in manual or industrial work.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00017718n: A covering for the head, often in the approximate form of a cone or a cylinder closed at its top end, and sometimes having a brim and other decoration.
An item of clothing worn on a person's head.
Headdress that protects the head from bad weather; has shaped crown and usually a brim
A hat is a head covering.
"Chapeau" is a French term signifying a hat or other covering for the head.
An item of clothing intended to cover the head made from material hard enough to have a shape independant of the skull, and most commonly with a rim.

apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s construction worker emoji is presented with a determined, focused expression, often wearing a hard hat and safety vest rendered with realistic textures and depth. The glossy 3D shading and precise detailing on Apple devices give this emoji a professional and capable appearance. He signifies hard work, building, projects, or anyone involved in manual labor and skilled trades, embodying a spirit of effort and accomplishment.
